Name: Nibû
About the game: (Preview video above is outdated, a new one will follow up soon) Nibû is a real-time strategy game set in the ancient near east. Choose between 3 different allied factions, build your base and defeat the hordes of enemies. Be challenged by 3 different scenarios. War has brought ruin upon the world of the Ashur Union. The allied 'Horde' has destroyed a large part of their standing army and is winning decisively. The few battles that decide their fate are in your hands! Features RTS Style unit control and construction Wave Based Endless Survival Mode Custimize your games with wave strength, frequency, and intelligence Fight enemies on an epic scale with hordes of enemies attacking your base Unique nemesis' that challenge specific skills and management Fortify your base and lay out traps Full control over your economy, assign units to farms, agriculture, forests and mines Build large cities, sustain your economy Recruit large armies to dominate your foes Protect your Capitol Defend yourself from armies and hordes that grow continuously stronger and require more tactical maneuvers to beat New Skirmish mode: Fight one of the 5 iconic enemies in a Skirmish New Enemy Units: Over 17 different faction-specific units with unique strengths and weaknesses. Hostile Camps: Destroy battle encampments to gain gold and weapons.
